q1.question: How is the captured face photo data handled? Is privacy safe?
q1.answer: No PII is required, and data can be sent anonymously after on-device preprocessing. Data retention is a default of 30 days (variable), and region selection for Japan/US/EU is supported.

q2.question: How long does implementation take?
q2.answer: Implementation is possible in as little as 1 week. This may vary depending on your system environment and requirements, so please contact us for details.

q3.question: Can it be integrated into existing e-commerce sites or apps?
q3.answer: Yes, the iPad app works standalone. Contact us if you need integration with existing systems.

FaqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FaqSection.q1: How is the captured face photo data handled? Is privacy safe?
FaqSection.a1_p1: Yes, customer privacy is our top priority.
FaqSection.a1_p2: In the standard simple diagnosis, all face images are processed within the customer's smartphone. Analysis data is never sent to the cloud server.
FaqSection.a1_p3: Only when using more advanced analysis (PRO version function), after obtaining explicit consent from the customer, anonymized data that cannot identify individuals is analyzed in a secure cloud environment. For details on the data retention policy, please contact us directly.

ReportExamplesSection.title: See diagnostic reports in actual examples
ReportExamplesSection.subtitle: Experience how AI analyzes the condition of your skin and what insights it provides with an actual report.

PrivacySection.privacy_main_subtitle: Your data is strictly protected, and we strive for transparent operations.
PrivacySection.privacy1_desc: All communications and stored data are protected by industry-standard encryption technology.
PrivacySection.privacy2_desc: Access to your data is strictly managed to prevent unauthorized access.
PrivacySection.privacy3_desc: We clearly disclose our policies on data collection, use, and sharing.

StorySection.story_main_subtitle: Weaving the next-generation 'skin story' with AI and data.
StorySection.story_para1: Visage AI was born to provide scientifically-backed, personalized solutions to all those with skin concerns. We combine cutting-edge AI technology with dermatological knowledge to enable deep skin analysis that was previously impossible.
StorySection.story_para2: We aim to be a partner that understands each customer's 'skin story' and guides them to optimal care, not just a diagnostic tool. By visualizing skin conditions and tracking changes, we support customers in confidently pursuing beauty.

TechnologySection.tech_main_title: 3 Features That Transform Inbound Customer Service
TechnologySection.tech_main_subtitle: Break the language barrier and deliver convincing recommendations.
TechnologySection.tech_desc1: AI highlights skin areas of concern with heatmaps. Even hard-to-describe skin issues become clearâ€”just show the screen to build shared understanding.
TechnologySection.tech_title2: Personal Color Analysis with Data Logic
TechnologySection.tech_desc2: Objective color-space analysis instantly determines warm/cool undertones. Dramatically improves the persuasiveness of makeup recommendations.
TechnologySection.ux_main_title: Your Store's iPad Becomes a Beauty Expert
TechnologySection.ux_desc1: Just install the app on your existing iPad. Start serving inbound customers tomorrow.
TechnologySection.ux_desc2: AI provides the evidenceâ€”even new staff can deliver consistently high-quality consultations.

ResultsSection.results_main_subtitle: Visage AI is improving customer experience and business results in various industries.
ResultsSection.result1_desc: Personalized diagnosis significantly improves customer engagement and satisfaction.
ResultsSection.result2_desc: Accurate product recommendations improve purchase rates on e-commerce sites.
ResultsSection.result3_desc: Continuous tracking of skin condition promotes repeat purchases by customers.
ResultsSection.results_conclusion: Visage AI strongly supports your business growth with data-driven skin diagnosis.

ScalabilitySection.scalability_main_subtitle: iPad app adapts to any store size.
ScalabilitySection.scalability1_desc: Just download from App Store. No specialized equipment or construction required.
ScalabilitySection.scalability2_desc: From single store to chain deployment, flexible options match your scale.

story.title: Translation Apps Don't Sell Cosmetics.
story.lead: Why language barriers cost beauty counters real revenue
story.alt: Tokyo skyline with elegant East Asian woman illustration and subtle circuitry motif
story.storyLead: Beauty-specific nuances like 'high-hydration primer for dry skin' or 'cool-toned vivid lipsticks' are often lost in standard translation apps. This leads to safe, basic service and missed cross-sell opportunities. Visage AI breaks this barrier not by translating words, but by presenting objective, data-driven product recommendations directly to the customer and staff.
story.appNote: Available now as an iPad app. No development required.
